Actions.Text: REFERRED TO NEW YORK CITY EDUCATION

Title: Extends certain provisions relating to the New York city school construction authority to 2028
Summary: Extends certain provisions relating to the New York city school construction authority to 2028.
LawCode: Amd ยง1735, Pub Auth L; amd ยง19, Chap 738 of 1988
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to certain contracts of the New York city school construction authority; and to amend chapter 738 of the laws of 1988 amending the administrative code of the city of New York and other laws relating to establishing the New York city school construction authority, in relation to extending certain provisions of such chapter relating to certain contracts of the New York city school construction authority
